intro: Dive into the game, enjoy the process and discover new stunning illustrations!
description:
Welcome to the world of classic puzzles, where impressive images of pumped-up guys, made in anime style, are waiting for you! Feel the real process of assembling a puzzle, enjoying detailed illustrations that will give you aesthetic pleasure and immersion in the atmosphere of the game.

Each image is created with special attention to detail, and the realistic assembly mechanics make you feel like you are putting together a real paper puzzle. Relax, immerse yourself in the process and enjoy the magnificent art in high resolution.

Game features:

- More than 40 unique puzzles with muscular anime characters.
- Realistic feeling of assembling a real paper puzzle.
- High-quality images with detailed drawing.
- Relaxing music that creates a cozy atmosphere.
- Possibility to examine each image in detail after assembly.
